mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homogeneousMineral (mineralName, heterOrHomo, reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel, visualClassificationOfReflectivity, doubleReflection, internalReflection, markHardness, mohsHardness, vickersHardness, reflectionRotationAngle, Dispersion) VALUES (#{name}, #{heterOrHomo}, #{reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel}, #{visualClassificationOfReflectivity}, #{doubleReflection}, #{internalReflection}, #{markHardness}, #{mohsHardness}, #{vickersHardness}, #{reflectionRotationAngle}, #{Dispersion})
mapper.update: UPDATE homogeneousMineral SET mineralName=#{name}, heterOrHomo=#{heterOrHomo}, reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel=#{reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel}, visualClassificationOfReflectivity=#{visualClassificationOfReflectivity}, doubleReflection=#{doubleReflection}, internalReflection=#{internalReflection}, markHardness=#{markHardness}, mohsHardness=#{mohsHardness}, vickersHardness=#{vickersHardness}, reflectionRotationAngle=#{reflectionRotationAngle}, Dispersion=#{Dispersion} WHERE mineralName = #{name}
mapper.select: SELECT mineralName as name, heterOrHomo, reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel, visualClassificationOfReflectivity, doubleReflection, internalReflection, markHardness, mohsHardness, vickersHardness, reflectionRotationAngle, Dispersion FROM homogeneousMineral
